string.name: MainAbility_desc
string.value: manage the permissions of all applications from the permission and application dimensions

string.name: record_time_limit
string.value: Access records in the last 7 days

string.name: get_the_exact_position
string.value: Allows this application to get your exact location. When closed, the location obtained by the application will be biased. Some applications that do not support this function may fail to be located.

string.name: close_exact_position
string.value: When Precise location is turned off, the location obtained by the application is biased.

string.name: fuzzy_to_exact
string.value: position access to change from "APPROXIMATE POSITION" to "EXACT POSITION"?

string.name: global_title_camera_and_microphone
string.value: The camera and microphone are disabled

string.name: global_desc_camera
string.value: An application is accessing the camera. Click "Open" to resume normal use.

string.name: global_desc_microphone
string.value: An application is accessing the microphone. Click "Open" to resume normal use.

string.name: global_desc_camera_and_microphone
string.value: An application is accessing the camera and microphone. Click "Open" to resume normal use.

string.name: microphone_is_off
string.value: The microphone is turned off. No application can use the microphone to record audio.

string.name: camera_is_off
string.value: The camera is turned off and no apps can currently use the camera to take photos and videos.

string.name: close_microphone_desc
string.value: After the microphone is disabled, all application services cannot use the microphone to make calls, record audio, or voice wake up. To restore data, turn on the microphone switch.

string.name: close_camera_desc
string.value: After it is turned off, all apps will not be able to use the camera properly to take photos, videos or perform face recognition. To restore data, turn on the camera switch.

string.name: pasteBoard_desc
string.value: Disabling will no longer allow this app to access the clipboard.

string.name: groupName_appList
string.value: Read the list of installed apps

string.name: group_label_appList
string.value: read the list of installed apps?

string.name: enable_description_location
string.value: When the system location service is enabled, %s apps are allowed to obtain the location of the device.

string.name: enable_description_camera
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to use the camera to take photos and videos. This permission allows the app to use the camera at any time without your confirmation.

string.name: enable_description_microphone
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to record audio using microphones. This permission allows the app to record audio at any time without your confirmation.

string.name: enable_description_read_contacts
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to read data about contacts stored on the device, including how often you communicate with specific individuals by calling, sending emails, or otherwise. This permission allows an app to save your contact data, which a malicious app may share without your knowledge.

string.name: enable_description_write_contacts
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to modify data about contacts stored on the device, including how often you communicate with specific individuals by calling, sending emails, or otherwise. This permission allows the app to delete contact data.

string.name: enable_description_read_calendar
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to read all calendar activities stored on the device, including those of friends or colleagues. This permission allows the app to share or save your calendar data, regardless of whether it is confidential or sensitive.

string.name: enable_description_write_calendar
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to send event invitations on behalf of the calendar owner, as well as to add, delete, and change events (including those of friends or colleagues) that you can modify on your device. A malicious application with this permission can pose as the calendar owner to send spam, and can also modify the activity or add fake activity without the owner's knowledge.

string.name: enable_description_read_whole_calendar
string.value: %s apps are allowed to read the entire calendar.

string.name: enable_description_write_whole_calendar
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to add, delete, and change all calendars.

string.name: enable_description_sport
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to identify your fitness movements.

string.name: enable_description_health
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to access data from the sensors you use to measure your physical condition, such as your heart rate.

string.name: enable_description_distributed_datasync
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to discover and access other devices for collaborative operations between multiple devices.

string.name: enable_description_image
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to access pictures and videos on your device.

string.name: enable_description_audios
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to access music and audio on your device.

string.name: enable_description_documents
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to access files on your device.

string.name: enable_description_ADS
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to create a profile or show you personalized ads based on your AD identifier.

string.name: enable_description_appList
string.value: %s apps are allowed to read the list of installed apps on the local device.

string.name: enable_description_bluetooth
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to use Bluetooth to find and connect to nearby devices.

string.name: enable_description_pasteboard
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to read and write clipboard information without using the system clipboard control. It is recommended to use apps that use system clipboard controls that only temporarily access the clipboard when you click to reduce the risk of private data being accessed.

string.name: enable_description_folder
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to access files and folders.

string.name: enable_description_nearLink
string.value: %s apps have been allowed to access NearLink.

string.name: forbidden_description_location
string.value: When the system positioning service is enabled, applications are not allowed to obtain the location of the device.

string.name: forbidden_description_camera
string.value: Apps that use cameras to take photos and videos have been banned. This permission allows the app to use the camera at any time without your confirmation.

string.name: forbidden_description_microphone
string.value: Your app has been disabled from using microphones to record audio. This permission allows the app to record audio at any time without your confirmation.

string.name: forbidden_description_read_contacts
string.value: Apps are prohibited from reading data about contacts stored on your device, including how often you communicate with specific individuals by calling, sending emails, or otherwise. This permission allows an app to save your contact data, which a malicious app may share without your knowledge.

string.name: forbidden_description_write_contacts
string.value: Apps are prohibited from modifying data about contacts stored on the device, including how often you communicate with specific individuals by making phone calls, sending emails, or otherwise. This permission allows the app to delete contact data.

string.name: forbidden_description_read_calendar
string.value: Apps are prohibited from reading all calendar activities stored on the device, including those of friends or colleagues. This permission allows the app to share or save your calendar data, regardless of whether it is confidential or sensitive.

string.name: forbidden_description_write_calendar
string.value: Apps are prohibited from sending event invitations on behalf of the calendar owner, while allowing it to add, delete, and change events that you can modify on your device (including those of friends or colleagues). A malicious application with this permission can pose as the calendar owner to send spam, and can also modify the activity or add fake activity without the owner's knowledge.

string.name: forbidden_description_read_whole_calendar
string.value: Apps have been prevented from reading all calendars.

string.name: forbidden_description_write_whole_calendar
string.value: Apps are prohibited from adding, deleting, and changing all calendars.

string.name: forbidden_description_sport
string.value: Apps are prohibited from recognizing your fitness exercise.

string.name: forbidden_description_health
string.value: Apps are prohibited from accessing data from sensors that you use to measure your physical condition, such as your heart rate.

string.name: forbidden_description_distributed_datasync
string.value: Apps are prohibited from discovering and accessing other devices for collaborative operations between multiple devices.

string.name: forbidden_description_image
string.value: Apps have been blocked from accessing pictures and videos on your device.

string.name: forbidden_description_audios
string.value: Apps have been blocked from accessing music and audio on your device.

string.name: forbidden_description_documents
string.value: Apps have been prevented from accessing files on your device.

string.name: forbidden_description_ADS
string.value: Apps are prohibited from creating profiles or showing you personalized ads based on your AD identifier.

string.name: forbidden_description_appList
string.value: Apps are prohibited from reading the list of installed applications on the local device.

string.name: forbidden_description_bluetooth
string.value: Apps are prohibited from using Bluetooth to find or connect to nearby devices.

string.name: forbidden_description_pasteboard
string.value: Apps are prohibited from reading or writing clipboard information without using the system clipboard control. It is recommended to use apps that use system clipboard controls that only temporarily access the clipboard when you click to reduce the risk of private data being accessed.

string.name: forbidden_description_folder
string.value: Apps have been prevented from accessing files and folders.

string.name: forbidden_description_nearLink
string.value: Apps have been prohibited from accessing NearLink.

string.name: risk_warning
string.value: Risk application does not obtain this permission

string.name: SecurityTitle_mediaFiles
string.value: Secure access to media and files

string.name: SecurityDescription_location
string.value: This button is certified by the system security and only allows "%s" temporary access to location information when you click this button, in order to reduce the continuous access of your private data by applications.

string.name: SecurityDescription_mediaFiles
string.value: This button is certified by the system security and only allows "%s" temporary access to media and files when you click this button, in order to reduce the continuous access of your private data by applications.
